emails.text:
Impuls connected to your Google Account



Hi Impuls,

Impuls now has access to your Google Account impulsappdemo@gmail.com.

Impuls can:

    - View your email messages and settings


You should only give this access to apps you trust. Review or remove apps
connected to your account any time at My Account
<https://myaccount.google.com/permissions>.

Learn more <https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/3466521> about what
it means to connect an app to your account.
The Google Accounts team



This email can't receive replies. For more information, visit the Google
Accounts Help Center <https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/3466521>.



You received this mandatory email service announcement to update you about
important changes to your Google product or account.

© 2019 Google LLC, 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA

sender: Subject: Technip Application for Position of Intern Software Engineer
emails.text:
> Begin forwarded message:
> 
> From: Human Resources <recruitment@hr.technipfmc.com>
> Subject: Technip Application for Position of Intern Software Engineer
> Date: March 1, 2019 at 12:47:07 PM PST
> To: lnordahl@uci.edu
> 
> Dear Lasse Nordahl,
> Thank you for your application for the above position.
> We have carefully considered your application. However, we regret to inform you that you have not been selected.
> 
> Thank you once again for your interest you have shown in the position.
> Yours sincerely,
> Technip Recruitment Team
>  
>  Replies to this message are undeliverable and will not reach the Human Resources Department. Please do not reply.
>

sender: Subject: From the D. E. Shaw group
emails.text:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: <recruiting@deshaw.com>
Date: Fri, Feb 22, 2019 at 5:31 AM
Subject: From the D. E. Shaw group
To: <yhezkiya@ucsd.edu>
Cc: <sgrowth@deshaw.com>


Dear Yehonatan,

Thank you for your interest in the D. E. Shaw group. We have reviewed your
resume, and, although it is clear that someone with your qualifications has
much to offer, we have been unable to identify an ideal match between your
particular background and experience and our current needs. However, we
will keep your resume in our files on the chance that a suitable position
should become available at a later date.

We appreciate your participation in our recruiting process and wish you the
best in your job search.

Sincerely,

Human Capital | Recruiting
D. E. Shaw & Co., L.P.

sender: Subject: Regarding your application to Qualtrics
emails.text:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: <recruiting1@qualtrics.com>
Date: Thu, Feb 28, 2019 at 2:33 PM
Subject: Regarding your application to Qualtrics
To: <yhezkiya@ucsd.edu>


Yehonatan,

Thank you for your interest in Qualtrics and the Software Engineering
Intern - Summer 2019 position. We have received many qualified candidates
for this position and unfortunately, we have chosen to move forward with
other candidates whom we feel best fit our needs at this time. We will keep
your information on hand and contact you if we feel there is a fit for a
future position.

Thanks again for your interest in Qualtrics and we wish you luck in your
future endeavors.

Best,

Qualtrics

sender: Subject: Amazon Application – 2019 Summer Amazon Future Engineer Internship
emails.text:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: sde-university-applicants <sde-university-applicants@amazon.com>
Date: Fri, Feb 22, 2019 at 4:14 AM
Subject: Amazon Application – 2019 Summer Amazon Future Engineer Internship
To: yhezkiya@ucsd.edu <yhezkiya@ucsd.edu>


Hello!

After serious consideration, we have decided not to move forward with your
application for the* 2019 Summer Amazon Future Engineer Internship *position.
We hope that you will consider Amazon in the future and invite you to
reapply to positions of interest in six months on the *Amazon Careers
<https://www.amazon.jobs/en/business_categories/university-recruiting>*
 site.

Please note that Amazon does not provide feedback, so unfortunately we are
unable to give you any specific details. However, we will certainly keep
your resume on file and should another position requiring your skills and
experience become available, we will contact you.

We want to thank you for your time and interest in Amazon.

Best Regards,

*Amazon Student Programs*

[image: amazon_logo_RGB][image: 1538984196034-672.png]

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Jaime Onofre <jonofre@seismic.com>
Date: Mon, Feb 11, 2019 at 10:15 AM
Subject: Seismic - Thank you
To: yhezkiya@ucsd.edu <yhezkiya@ucsd.edu>


Hi Yehonatan,



Thank you for taking the time to visit us and participating in our 2019
Intern Hackathon. While we enjoyed meeting and learning more about you, we
had limited spots for our 2019 internships. Unfortunately, we’ve decided to
move forward with another candidate.



We wish you the best of luck and hope our paths cross again in the future.



*Jaime Onofre*
Talent Acquisition
jonofre@seismic.com | 760.214.7441 <(760)%20214-7441>

*Seismic* *Software*  | www.seismic.com
<https://nam03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.seismic.com%2F&data=01%7C01%7Cjonofre%40seismic.com%7C0423f45d44994574321808d6904ba409%7C3566798d3d314a2fa3df3a4fe9c9fd40%7C1&sdata=uBeWFSjkXmM1RFv4mZ1UfJY7kOR4skhW7m6VWa3o3W8%3D&reserved=0>

sender: Subject: Viasat - Recruitment Update for 974 - Software Engineer Intern
emails.text:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Do Not Reply <donotreply@viasat.com>
Date: Fri, Feb 22, 2019 at 2:32 PM
Subject: Viasat - Recruitment Update for 974 - Software Engineer Intern
To: <yhezkiya@ucsd.edu>


[image: ViaSat Logo]
Hello Yehonatan,

Thank you again for your interest in Viasat. Although your qualifications
are impressive, we wanted to let you know that the the team has decided to
move forward with another candidate for the following position:

Req#974 - Software Engineer Intern

We encourage you to continue visiting our career site

your interest in furthering your career with Viasat and hope you will
consider Viasat again in the future.

Sincerely,

Viasat Talent Acquisition Team

sender: Subject: Request for Code Sample - Brain Corporation Yehonatan Hezkiya
emails.text:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Brittany Bridges <recruiting+45305124@applytojob.com>
Date: Tue, Feb 12, 2019 at 2:20 PM
Subject: Request for Code Sample - Brain Corporation Yehonatan Hezkiya
To: Yehonatan Hezkiya <yhezkiya@ucsd.edu>


Hi Yehonatan,

Your application has been reviewed by our hiring team for 2019 Summer
Intern - Software QA & Automation Engineering and they would like to see a
sample of your coding skills. Please see the attached problem for you to
solve. You are free to use any reference material you choose; please submit
a google drive link with your code and any build instructions before 5pm
PST on March 1st. The intent isn’t to demonstrate an understanding of the
algorithms, but to deliver a complete solution. Please title the file as
well as the primary folder with the following format: Hezkiya-Yehonatan.

Please reply back to this email so we know you've received it (and it
didn't end up in spam). If you can't complete the challenge within the time
frame, let us know.

Sincerely,

Talent Acquisition at Brain Corporation

*Code Sample - Lidar (attached)*

> On Jan 12, 2019, at 12:00 PM, Spotify Recruiting Team <no-reply@jobvite.com> wrote:
> 
> Hi Lasse,
> 
> Thank you for applying for the Front End/Web Developer - Summer Internship - Boston position. There are lots of great internships out there, and we’re honored you applied for ours. 
> 
> We got a very large number of applications this year and unfortunately, we have decided to not move further with your application for this role. We’re sorry that because of the huge turnout we will not be able to give you any individual feedback.
> 
> Please note that if you applied for several different summer internships with us, you will get a separate reply for each one. 
> 
> Thank you once more for taking an interest in Spotify. There will be other opportunities here, and we hope you will consider us again when they come up! 
> 
> May you always have music in your life,
> The Spotify Recruiting Team
> 
> www.spotifyjobs.com <http://www.spotifyjobs.com/>
> facebook.com/spotifyjobs <http://facebook.com/spotifyjobs> 
> linkedin.com/company/spotify <http://linkedin.com/company/spotify> 
> instagram.com/spotifyjobs <http://instagram.com/spotifyjobs>
> 
> You can change your email preferences at:
> https://app.jobvite.com/l?ksJ8uOhwV <https://app.jobvite.com/l?ksJ8uOhwV>
